remarks:
Extend wff definition to include "all some" applied to a top-level implication, which means ` ps ` is true whenever ` ph ` is true, and there is at least least one ` x ` where ` ph ` is true.  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Oct-2018.) 

---

This syntax is primitive. The first axiom using it is #P_df-alsi|NAV_LINK|HIDE_TVI.

---
